text: Really old and nostalgic mall. Full of childhood memories for me. Nice cafe on level 1 and hair studio on lvl 2.
Oldest mall food court have lots of options view also very beautiful
Facade is repainted which looks super fresh.

Very old mall but has many good stalls, eg. Giant at basement level, bubble tea, plenty of good and cheap hairdressers, McDonald’s, some excellent restaurants (Thai, Korean, western), food court at top floor, massage parlours, and tuition classes. It’s next to Beauty World MRT station so it’s just matter of time before it gets many upgrades and more interesting shops.
Nostalgic place to visit, especially level 4 nice food choices
